How does AlphaFold-Multimer contribute t: It predicts interactions between nanobody candidates and the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein, aiding in identifying high-affinity binders.
It sequences the genetic material of SARS-CoV-2 to identify potential binding sites for nanobodies.
It synthesizes nanobodies in vitro for direct testing against the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
It modifies the spike protein structure to enhance binding with existing antibodies.
How does understanding the structural dy: It informs modifications to enhance binding affinity and stability of nanobodies.
It determines the genetic sequence required for nanobody synthesis.
It predicts the immune response elicited by nanobody binding.

It measures the thermal stability of the Arl2-Cdk5rap2 complex.

What method was used to validate the pre: X-ray crystallography and nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy.
What role does Arl2 play in mouse cortic: Arl2 regulates neural progenitor cell proliferation, differentiation, and neuronal migration through microtubule growth.
Arl2 is involved in mitochondrial energy production essential for cortical development.
Arl2 functions as a transcription factor regulating gene expression in neural progenitor cells.
Arl2 acts as a signaling molecule in synaptic transmission during cortical development.
